alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 3:41PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Tishomingo, eastern Alcorn, southeastern McNairy and southern Hardin Counties through 415 PM CST... At 341 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Glen, or near Corinth, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corinth, J P Coleman State Park, Pickwick Landing State Park, Burnsville, Glen, Walnut Grove, Pickwick Dam, Pineflat, Hinkle, Farmington, Michie, Kossuth, Doskie, Strickland, Hamburg, Biggersville, Bruton Branch, Jobes, Acton and Red Sulphur Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for western Tennessee. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 800 PM CST for northeastern Mississippi.
